short_description: Discover Belize, a Central American paradise where the Caribbean Sea meets ancient Mayan civilization. Experience the world's second-largest barrier reef, explore ancient ruins, dive in the Blue Hole, and immerse yourself in the diverse culture of this English-speaking nation.

health.tap_water_safety: Generally safe in major cities, bottled water recommended
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, restaurants, and stores
US Dollar is widely accepted alongside the Belize Dollar

tipping.hotels: Tipping is appreciated for porters ($1-2 per bag) and housekeeping ($2-5 per day)
tipping.guides: 10-15% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 10-15% tip is customary for good service, though some restaurants may include a service charge
tipping.taxis: Tipping is appreciated but not mandatory, rounding up is common

weather.title: Belize has a tropical climate with a dry season from November to April and a wet season from May to October. The country experiences warm temperatures year-round, with the Caribbean coast being more humid.

when_to_visit.title: Dry Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Perfect weather with low humidity, minimal rainfall, and warm temperatures. This is the peak tourist season, ideal for diving, snorkeling, exploring Mayan ruins, and outdoor adventures. Best time for visiting the barrier reef and Blue Hole

when_to_visit.title: Shoulder Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm temperatures with occasional brief showers. Fewer crowds and lower prices make this a great time to visit. Still excellent weather for diving, snorkeling, and exploring the islands

when_to_visit.title: Wet Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher humidity and more frequent rain showers, with peak hurricane season in September and October. Lower prices and fewer tourists, but be aware of weather conditions. Still possible to enjoy activities between rain showers

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Belize is during the dry season from November to April when the weather is perfect with low humidity, minimal rainfall, and ideal conditions for diving, snorkeling, exploring Mayan ruins, and outdoor adventures
